title: WTB: Great looking mid/lower grade T or E cards
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: WTB: Great looking mid/lower grade T or E cards
posts.post_content:
I've been thinking about doing this for awhile and want to see what's out there:

Requirements: NM or better appearance (Ex/Mt will be considered for HOF/SLer) and NO TRIMMING and NO PAPER LOSS

Acceptable: small wrinkles, staining - tobacco, glue, dirt or otherwise

I will consider graded cards (but can't afford to start buying 7s, 8s and 9s).  I hope to see several woefully undergraded '2s' - I know that they are out there ..... I used to own a few :) 

Send back/front scan of any T or E card along with asking price to:

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Bump.

Will consider cards graded up to '4.5'.

Best,
S
